Constructor Detail

SmallMolecule

public SmallMolecule(AtomList atoms)
Constructor. Checks whether all atoms really belong to a single small molecule. Furthermore assigns the amino acid to one of various amino acid types.

Parameters:
atoms - - AtomList object holding the atomic coordinates of this amino acid.
